import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Content, HeadWrap, SubHeadWrap, TrainingPage } from "./Styles"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; function ShortTraining(props) { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return ( <> Mediation Online Training Programme - JustAct World of Mediation
{/* Welcome to The World of Mediation */} We have created a completely online training course just for you. The link to the training is placed below for you to join and partake of the same. Course Objectives

The programme focusses on ADR in general and mediation in specific. It is a quick go-to tool for people looking to learn about how mediation works.

Learning Objectives
  • Introduction to ADR.
  • What is mediation, its objective and its benefits?
  • Mediation vs Litigation - comparative analysis.
  • Nature of disputes & personalities in a dispute.
  • Structured Process of Mediation.
  • Principles of Negotiation.
  • Mediation settlement agreement.
  • JustAct - Introduction to the platform.
 Duration
  • 10 hours of video lectures.
  • Self learning assignments.
 Link

To access and purchase the World Of Mediation course, please click the link below.

window.open( "https://www.udemy.com/course/world-of-mediation/?referralCode=AC543A687FAF0488CE66" ) } > https://www.udemy.com/course/world-of-mediation/?referralCode=AC543A687FAF0488CE66 {/* Brochure Click here to Open */} ); } export default ShortTraining;
